name: fmt::DebugAsHex
doc_adt:
Specifies whether the [`Debug`] trait should use lower-/upper-case
 hexadecimal or normal integers.

VariantIdx(Some(0))-FieldIdx(None).name: Lower
VariantIdx(Some(0))-FieldIdx(None).doc: Use lower-case hexadecimal integers for the `Debug` trait (like [the `x?` type](../../std/fmt/index.html#formatting-traits)).

VariantIdx(Some(1))-FieldIdx(None).name: Upper
VariantIdx(Some(1))-FieldIdx(None).doc: Use upper-case hexadecimal integers for the `Debug` trait (like [the `X?` type](../../std/fmt/index.html#formatting-traits)).
